words.when_to_say: Used as a general greeting, particularly in Arabic-speaking countries.
words.example: As-salāmu ʿalaykum, how are you? (As-salāmu ʿalaykum, kayfa ḥāluka?)

words.when_to_say: Used to welcome someone, often in a friendly or polite context.
words.example: Ahlan wa sahlan, please come in! (Ahlan wa sahlan, tafaddal!)

words.when_to_say: Used to ask someone about their well-being.
words.example: Kayfa ḥāluka? أنا بخير. (Kayfa ḥāluka? Ana bikhayr.) – How are you? I am fine.

words.when_to_say: Used to express gratitude.
words.example: Shukran for helping me! (Shukran ʿalā musāʿadatī!)

words.when_to_say: Used to make a polite request.
words.example: Min faḍlik, can you help me? (Min faḍlik, hal mumkin an tusaʿidīnī?)

words.when_to_say: Used to affirm or agree with something.
words.example: Naʿam, I understand. (Naʿam, ana afham.)

words.when_to_say: Used to deny or refuse something.
words.example: Lā, I don't want to go. (Lā, lā urīdu an athhab.)

words.when_to_say: Used to greet someone in the morning.
words.example: Ṣabāḥ al-ḵayr! How are you today? (Ṣabāḥ al-ḵayr! Kayfa ḥāluka al-yawm?)

words.when_to_say: Used to greet someone in the evening.
words.example: Masāʾ al-ḵayr! How was your day? (Masāʾ al-ḵayr! Kayfa kāna yawmuka?)

words.when_to_say: Used when parting ways with someone.
words.example: Ilā al-liqāʾ, see you tomorrow! (Ilā al-liqāʾ, arāka ghadān!)

words.when_to_say: A casual greeting.
words.example: Ahlan, how's it going? (Ahlan, kayfa ḥāluka?)

words.when_to_say: Used to request something politely.
words.example: Luṭfan, could you pass me the salt? (Luṭfan, hal yumkinuk imdādī bāl-milḥ?)

words.when_to_say: Used when asking a group of people how they are.
words.example: Kayfa ḥālukum? (How are you all?)

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the number one.
words.example: عندي واحد فقط. (ʿIndī wāḥid faqaṭ.) – I have one only.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the number two.
words.example: أنا عندي اثنان من الكتب. (Ana ʿindī ithnān min al-kutub.) – I have two books.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the number three.
words.example: لدينا ثلاثة طلاب في الفصل. (Ladaynā thalātha ṭullāb fī al-foṣl.) – We have three students in the class.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the number four.
words.example: أريد أربعة تفاحات. (Urīd arbaʿa tuffāḥāt.) – I want four apples.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the number five.
words.example: في جيبي خمسة ريالات. (Fī jībī khamsa riyālāt.) – In my pocket, I have five riyals.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the number six.
words.example: سألتني عن ستة أسئلة. (Saʾaltanī ʿan sitta asʾila.) – You asked me six questions.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the number seven.
words.example: أحتاج إلى سبعة أيام للعمل. (Aḥtāj ilā sabʿa ayyām lil-ʿamal.) – I need seven days to work.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the number eight.
words.example: يعيشون في منزل به ثمانية غرف. (Yaʿīshūn fī manzil bihi thamāniya ghuraf.) – They live in a house with eight rooms.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the number nine.
words.example: رأيت تسعة طيور. (Raʾaytu tisʿa ṭuyūr.) – I saw nine birds.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the number ten.
words.example: هناك عشرة أشخاص في الحفل. (Hunāka ʿashara ashkhāṣ fī al-ḥafl.) – There are ten people at the party.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to a number or count of something.
words.example: كم عدد الكتب في المكتبة؟ (Kam ʿadad al-kutub fī al-maktaba?) – How many books are in the library?

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the first day of the week.
words.example: الأحد هو أول يوم في الأسبوع. (Al-ʾAḥad huwa ʾawwal yawm fī al-usbūʿ.) – Sunday is the first day of the week.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the second day of the week.
words.example: أنا أذهب للعمل في الإثنين. (Ana ʾadhhabu lil-ʿamal fī al-Ithnayn.) – I go to work on Monday.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the third day of the week.
words.example: الثلاثاء هو يوم اجتماعنا. (Ath-Thulāthāʾ huwa yawm ʾijtimāʿinā.) – Tuesday is our meeting day.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the fourth day of the week.
words.example: نذهب إلى السوق في الأربعاء. (Nadhhabu ilā as-sūq fī al-Arbaʿāʾ.) – We go to the market on Wednesday.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the fifth day of the week.
words.example: الخميس هو يوم نهاية الأسبوع. (Al-Khamīs huwa yawm nihāyat al-usbūʿ.) – Thursday is the day before the weekend.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the sixth day of the week, typically a day for prayer and rest.
words.example: الجمعة يوم العطلة. (Al-Jumʿa yawm al-ʿuṭla.) – Friday is the holiday (day off).

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the seventh day of the week.
words.example: السبت هو بداية الأسبوع. (As-Sabt huwa bidāyat al-usbūʿ.) – Saturday is the start of the week.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the days in the weekly cycle.
words.example: أيام الأسبوع هي الأحد، الإثنين، الثلاثاء... (Ayyām al-usbūʿ hiya al-ʾAḥad, al-Ithnayn, ath-Thulāthāʾ...) – The days of the week are Sunday, Monday, Tuesday...

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the current day.
words.example: اليوم هو الخميس. (Al-Yawm huwa al-Khamīs.) – Today is Thursday.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the seven-day period from Sunday to Saturday.
words.example: الأسبوع يتكون من سبعة أيام. (Al-Usbūʿ yatakawwān min sabʿat ayyām.) – The week consists of seven days.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the day after today.
words.example: غداً سأذهب إلى المدرسة. (Ghadan saʾadhhabu ilā al-madrasa.) – Tomorrow, I will go to school.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the day before today.
words.example: البارحة كان يوم الجمعة. (Al-Bāriḥa kān yawm al-Jumʿa.) – Yesterday was Friday.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the weekend, usually Friday and Saturday in many Arab countries.
words.example: إجازة الأسبوع تبدأ يوم الجمعة. (Ijāzat al-usbūʿ tabdaʾ yawm al-Jumʿa.) – The weekend starts on Friday.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to your father or a father figure.
words.example: أبي يعمل في المستشفى. (Abī yaʿmal fī al-mustashfā.) – My father works in the hospital.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to your mother or a mother figure.
words.example: أمي طباخة ممتازة. (Ummī ṭabbākha mumtāza.) – My mother is an excellent cook.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to your brother.
words.example: أخي يدرس في الجامعة. (Akhī yadrus fī al-jāmiʿa.) – My brother studies at the university.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to your sister.
words.example: أختي تحب القراءة. (Ukhtī tuḥibb al-qirāʾa.) – My sister loves reading.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to your husband.
words.example: زوجي يعمل مهندساً. (Zawjī yaʿmal muhandisan.) – My husband works as an engineer.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to your wife.
words.example: زوجتي معلمة في المدرسة. (Zawjatī muʿallima fī al-madrasa.) – My wife is a teacher at the school.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to your son.
words.example: ابني يحب كرة القدم. (Ibnī yuḥibb kurat al-qadam.) – My son loves soccer.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to your daughter.
words.example: ابنتي تدرس في المدرسة. (Ibnatī tadrus fī al-madrasa.) – My daughter studies at the school.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to your grandfather.
words.example: جدي يحب القراءة. (Jaddī yuḥibb al-qirāʾa.) – My grandfather loves reading.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to your grandmother.
words.example: جدتي طيبة جداً. (Jaddatī ṭayyiba jiddan.) – My grandmother is very kind.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe the color red.
words.example: الوردة حمراء. (Al-warda ḥamrāʾ.) – The flower is red.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe the color blue.
words.example: البحر أزرق. (Al-baḥr azraq.) – The sea is blue.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe the color green.
words.example: العشب أخضر. (Al-ʿushb akhḍar.) – The grass is green.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe the color yellow.
words.example: الليمون أصفر. (Al-laymūn aṣfar.) – The lemon is yellow.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe the color orange.
words.example: البرتقال برتقالي. (Al-burtuqāl burtuqālī.) – The orange is orange.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe the color purple.
words.example: الزهور بنفسجية. (Az-zuhūr banafsajīyah.) – The flowers are purple.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe the color pink.
words.example: الفستان زهري. (Al-fustān zahrī.) – The dress is pink.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe the color black.
words.example: القط أسود. (Al-qiṭṭ aswad.) – The cat is black.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe the color white.
words.example: السحاب أبيض. (As-sahāb abyaḍ.) – The cloud is white.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe the color gray.
words.example: السيارة رمادية. (As-sayyārah ramādīyah.) – The car is gray.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe the color brown.
words.example: الشجرة بنيّة. (Ash-shajarah bunnīyah.) – The tree is brown.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe the color gold.
words.example: القلادة ذهبية. (Al-qalādah dhahabīyah.) – The necklace is gold.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe the color silver.
words.example: السلسلة فضية. (As-silsilah faḍḍīyah.) – The chain is silver.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe the color turquoise.
words.example: المرآة تركوازية. (Al-mir'āh tarkwāzīyah.) – The mirror is turquoise.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe the color pearl.
words.example: المجوهرات لؤلؤية. (Al-majūhārāt lu'lu'īyah.) – The jewelry is pearl-colored.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe the color navy blue.
words.example: السترة كحلية. (Al-sutrah kaḥlīyah.) – The jacket is navy blue.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe something or someone as aesthetically pleasing.
words.example: الزهرة جميلة. (Al-zahra jameela) - The flower is beautiful.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe something large in size.
words.example: المنزل كبير. (Al-manzil kabeer) - The house is big.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe something small in size.
words.example: الطفل صغير. (Al-ṭifl sagheer) - The child is small.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe something that moves or happens quickly.
words.example: السيارة سريعة. (Al-sayara sareeʿa) - The car is fast.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe something tall in height or long in length.
words.example: الشجرة طويلة. (Al-shajarah taweela) - The tree is tall.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe something or someone with great strength or power.
words.example: الرجل قوي. (Al-rajul qawi) - The man is strong.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe someone or something that is pleasant or friendly.
words.example: الطفل لطيف. (Al-ṭifl lateef) - The child is kind.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe something with high temperature.
words.example: الشاي ساخن. (Al-shay saakhen) - The tea is hot.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the staple food made from flour and water, commonly baked.
words.example: أريد خبزًا. (Ureed khubzan) - I want bread.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the staple grain often eaten with meals.
words.example: الأرز لذيذ. (Al-arz ladheeth) - The rice is delicious.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to sweet, edible fruits.
words.example: أحب الفواكه. (Uhibb al-fawakih) - I love fruits.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the edible flesh of animals.
words.example: أريد لحمًا. (Ureed lahman) - I want meat.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the poultry meat.
words.example: أحب الدجاج. (Uhibb al-dajaj) - I love chicken.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to plant-based food such as spinach, carrots, etc.
words.example: الخضروات صحية. (Al-khodrawat sahia) - Vegetables are healthy.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the dairy product made from milk.
words.example: أريد جبنًا. (Ureed jubnan) - I want cheese.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to a liquid dish made by boiling meat, vegetables, or legumes.
words.example: أحب الحساء. (Uhibb al-hasa'a) - I love soup.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the essential liquid for life.
words.example: أريد ماءً. (Ureed ma'an) - I want water.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to sugary foods or desserts.
words.example: الطعام لذيذ لكنني أريد الحلوى. (Al-ta'am ladheez lakinani ureed al-halwa) - The food is delicious, but I want dessert.

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to a place where books are kept for reading or borrowing.
words.example: أذهب إلى المكتبة للدراسة. (I go to the library to study.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to a place for medical treatment.
words.example: أحتاج إلى الذهاب إلى المستشفى. (I need to go to the hospital.)

words.when_to_say: Used when talking about an educational institution.
words.example: أطفالي يذهبون إلى المدرسة. (My children go to school.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to a place where coffee or tea is served.
words.example: أحب شرب القهوة في المقهى. (I like drinking coffee at the café.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to a large store that sells food and other goods.
words.example: أذهب إلى السوبر ماركت لشراء الطعام. (I go to the supermarket to buy food.)

words.when_to_say: Used when talking about a green space for leisure and relaxation.
words.example: نحب الذهاب إلى الحديقة في عطلة نهاية الأسبوع. (We like going to the park on the weekend.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to a place where meals are served to customers.
words.example: نحن نذهب إلى المطعم لتناول العشاء. (We go to the restaurant for dinner.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to a place of worship in Islam.
words.example: أذهب إلى المسجد للصلاة. (I go to the mosque to pray.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to a location where trains stop to pick up or drop off passengers.
words.example: القطار سيصل إلى محطة القطار في الساعة التاسعة. (The train will arrive at the train station at 9 o'clock.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the action of eating.
words.example: أنا آكل الآن. (Ana akul al-aan) - I am eating now.

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the action of drinking.
words.example: أشرب الماء. (Ashrab al-ma'a) - I am drinking water.

words.when_to_say: Used to indicate movement or travel from one place to another.
words.example: أذهب إلى المدرسة. (Adhab ila al-madrasa) - I go to school.

words.when_to_say: Used when indicating motion towards the speaker.
words.example: هو جاء إلى المنزل. (Huwa ja'a ila al-manzil) - He came to the house.

words.when_to_say: Used to indicate the act of doing something.
words.example: ماذا فعلت؟ (Mada fa'alt?) - What did you do?

words.when_to_say: Used when talking about the action of seeing something with one's eyes.
words.example: أنا رأيت الفيلم. (Ana ra'aytu al-film) - I saw the movie.

words.when_to_say: Used when talking about the action of writing something.
words.example: هو يكتب رسالة. (Huwa yaktub risāla) - He is writing a letter.

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the action of asking a question.
words.example: سألت المعلم. (Sa'altu al-mu'allim) - I asked the teacher.

words.when_to_say: Used when talking about the star at the center of our solar system, or the weather condition when it is bright and clear.
words.example: اليوم الشمس ساطعة. (Today, the sun is shining.)

words.when_to_say: Used when describing weather that involves rain.
words.example: الطقس اليوم ممطر. (The weather today is rainy.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to frozen precipitation that falls in the form of snowflakes.
words.example: سوف يسقط الثلج هذا المساء. (It will snow this evening.)

words.when_to_say: Used to describe strong winds and severe weather conditions, often accompanied by rain, snow, or hail.
words.example: هناك عاصفة قادمة. (There is a storm coming.)

words.when_to_say: Used to describe weather when the sky is covered by clouds and there is little or no sunlight.
words.example: اليوم الجو غائم. (The weather today is cloudy.)

words.when_to_say: Used to describe weather when the temperature is high and uncomfortable.
words.example: الطقس حار جدا اليوم. (The weather is very hot today.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the number 11 in Arabic.
words.example: لديّ إحدى عشرة كرة. (I have eleven balls.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the number 12 in Arabic.
words.example: هناك إثنا عشر طالبًا في الصف. (There are twelve students in the class.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the number 20 in Arabic.
words.example: أحتاج إلى عشرين دقيقة. (I need twenty minutes.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the number 30 in Arabic.
words.example: هو في الثلاثين من عمره. (He is in his thirties.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the number 40 in Arabic.
words.example: الساعة الرابعة والأربعون دقيقة. (The time is four forty.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the number 50 in Arabic.
words.example: الكتاب ثمنه خمسون ريالًا. (The book costs fifty riyals.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the number 60 in Arabic.
words.example: في الساعة السادسة والستين دقيقة. (At six sixty.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the number 70 in Arabic.
words.example: هناك سبعون شخصًا في الحفل. (There are seventy people at the party.)

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to a medical professional who treats illnesses.
words.example: الطبيب يعالج المرضى. (Al-tabeeb yu'ālij al-marda) - The doctor treats the patients.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to a professional who designs, builds, or maintains systems, structures, or machinery.
words.example: المهندس يبني الجسر. (Al-muhandis yabnee al-jisr) - The engineer builds the bridge.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to a person who educates students, typically in a school setting.
words.example: المدرس يشرح الدرس. (Al-mudarres yashrah al-dars) - The teacher explains the lesson.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to a person who practices law, advising or representing clients in legal matters.
words.example: المحامي يقدم المشورة القانونية. (Al-muhami yuqaddim al-mashura al-qanuniya) - The lawyer provides legal advice.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to a person who writes news articles or reports.
words.example: الصحفي يكتب مقالاً. (Al-sahafi yaktub maqālan) - The journalist writes an article.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to a person who cultivates crops or raises livestock for food or other products.
words.example: المزارع يزرع الحقول. (Al-muzari' yazra' al-ḥuqool) - The farmer plants the fields.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to a healthcare professional who provides care to patients, typically in a hospital setting.
words.example: الممرضة تساعد المرضى. (Al-mumarrida tusa'id al-marda) - The nurse helps the patients.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to a person who installs, repairs, or maintains electrical systems.
words.example: الكهربائي يصلح الأسلاك. (Al-kahraba'i yusliḥ al-aslāk) - The electrician fixes the wires.

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to a shirt, typically worn on the upper body.
words.example: أنا أرتدي قميصًا أبيض. (I am wearing a white shirt.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to pants or trousers, typically worn on the lower body.
words.example: الطقس بارد، سأرتدي بنطالًا دافئًا. (The weather is cold, I will wear warm pants.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to a dress, typically worn by women.
words.example: هي ترتدي فستانًا أحمر. (She is wearing a red dress.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to an outer garment worn for warmth, typically over other clothes.
words.example: في الشتاء، أرتدي معطفًا ثقيلًا. (In the winter, I wear a heavy coat.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to footwear worn on the feet.
words.example: أنا أشتري حذاء جديدًا. (I am buying new shoes.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to a head covering worn for warmth or fashion.
words.example: أرتدي قبعة لحماية نفسي من الشمس. (I wear a hat to protect myself from the sun.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to a lightweight jacket, often worn in mild weather or as a fashion item.
words.example: الجو بارد، سأرتدي جاكيتًا. (The weather is cold, I will wear a jacket.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to a pair of pants that end above the knee, typically worn in warm weather.
words.example: أحب ارتداء السراويل القصيرة في الصيف. (I like wearing shorts in the summer.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to a vehicle with four wheels, typically used for personal transportation.
words.example: أنا أمتلك سيارة جديدة. (I own a new car.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to a large motor vehicle used for transporting groups of people.
words.example: ركبنا الحافلة للذهاب إلى المدرسة. (We took the bus to go to school.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to a long vehicle that runs on tracks, used for transporting people or goods.
words.example: سأركب القطار إلى المدينة. (I will take the train to the city.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to a two-wheeled vehicle powered by pedaling.
words.example: أحب ركوب الدراجة في الصباح. (I like riding my bicycle in the morning.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to a vehicle that flies through the air, typically used for long-distance travel.
words.example: سأسافر إلى باريس على متن الطائرة. (I will travel to Paris by airplane.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to a small vessel used for traveling on water.
words.example: نذهب في رحلة بالقارب كل صيف. (We go on a boat trip every summer.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to a location where airplanes take off and land.
words.example: وصلت إلى المطار في الوقت المحدد. (I arrived at the airport on time.)

words.when_to_say: Used to indicate that something is inside or within a space or area.
words.example: الكتاب في الحقيبة. (Al-kitab fee al-haqeeba) - The book is in the bag.

words.when_to_say: Used to indicate position on top of or resting upon something.
words.example: القلم على الطاولة. (Al-qalam 'ala al-tawila) - The pen is on the table.

words.when_to_say: Used to indicate that something is below or beneath something else.
words.example: الحقيبة تحت الطاولة. (Al-haqeeba taht al-tawila) - The bag is under the table.

words.when_to_say: Used to indicate that something is beside or adjacent to something else.
words.example: أنا جالس بجانبك. (Ana jalis bijanibak) - I am sitting next to you.

words.when_to_say: Used to indicate that something is in front of something else.
words.example: السيارة أمام المنزل. (Al-sayara amam al-manzil) - The car is in front of the house.

words.when_to_say: Used to indicate that something is at the back or behind something else.
words.example: الطفل خلف البوابة. (Al-ṭifl khalf al-bawaba) - The child is behind the gate.

words.when_to_say: Used to indicate movement or direction towards a specific place or goal.
words.example: أنا ذاهب إلى السوق. (Ana dhahib ila al-souq) - I am going to the market.

words.when_to_say: Used to indicate the origin or starting point of something or someone.
words.example: أنا من مصر. (Ana min Misr) - I am from Egypt.

words.when_to_say: Used to indicate association or accompaniment.
words.example: أنا مع أصدقائي. (Ana ma'a asdiqai) - I am with my friends.

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the main room in a house where people gather for socializing or relaxing.
words.example: نحن نحب الجلوس في غرفة المعيشة. (We love sitting in the living room.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the room in a house where food is prepared and cooked.
words.example: أمي تعمل في المطبخ. (My mother is working in the kitchen.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the room in a house where people sleep.
words.example: أنا نائم في غرفة النوم. (I am sleeping in the bedroom.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the room for bathing or using the toilet.
words.example: أحتاج إلى الذهاب إلى الحمام. (I need to go to the bathroom.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to an outdoor space at home, usually with plants or a lawn.
words.example: أطفالي يلعبون في الحديقة. (My children are playing in the garden.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the floor of a building that is above the ground level.
words.example: غرفتي في الطابق العلوي. (My room is on the upper floor.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to a room where items are stored, often out of sight.
words.example: أضع الأغراض في المخزن. (I put the items in the storage room.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to a space for parking vehicles, usually attached to the house.
words.example: أوقف السيارة في المرآب. (I park the car in the garage.)

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the uppermost part of the body, where the brain, eyes, and mouth are located.
words.example: رأسي يؤلمني. (Ra'si yu'limuni) - My head hurts.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the organ responsible for vision.
words.example: عيني تؤلمني. (Ayni tu'limuni) - My eye hurts.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the part of the body used for holding or grasping things.
words.example: أنا أمسك بالقلم بيدي. (Ana amsik bil-qalam biyadi) - I am holding the pen with my hand.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the lower part of the body used for walking or standing.
words.example: قدمي تؤلمني. (Qadami tu'limuni) - My foot hurts.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the organ that pumps blood through the body.
words.example: قلبي ينبض بسرعة. (Qalbi yanbidhu bisura'a) - My heart is beating fast.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the part of the face used for eating, speaking, and breathing.
words.example: فتح فمه ليأكل. (Fataha famahu liya'kul) - He opened his mouth to eat.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the organ for breathing and smelling.
words.example: أنفي مسدود. (Anfi masdood) - My nose is blocked.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the organ for hearing.
words.example: أذني تؤلمني. (Udhuni tu'limuni) - My ear hurts.

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the activity of reading books, articles, etc.
words.example: أحب قراءة الروايات في وقت فراغي. (I enjoy reading novels in my free time.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the activity of creating pictures or designs with a pencil, pen, or other materials.
words.example: أريد أن أتعلم الرسم. (I want to learn drawing.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the activity of going from one place to another, often for leisure or exploration.
words.example: أسافر إلى أماكن جديدة في عطلاتي. (I travel to new places on my vacations.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the art of sound, usually in the form of songs, instruments, or melodies.
words.example: أستمع إلى الموسيقى كل يوم. (I listen to music every day.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to physical activities or games, such as football, tennis, etc.
words.example: أمارس الرياضة ثلاث مرات في الأسبوع. (I practice sports three times a week.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the activity of preparing food.
words.example: أحب الطبخ وتجربة وصفات جديدة. (I love cooking and trying new recipes.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the activity of taking photographs, either professionally or for fun.
words.example: أنا مهتم بالتصوير الفوتوغرافي. (I am interested in photography.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the activity of moving on foot at a moderate pace, usually for exercise or leisure.
words.example: أحب المشي في الطبيعة كل صباح. (I enjoy walking in nature every morning.)

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to a piece of furniture with a flat surface, used for various tasks.
words.example: الطاولة في وسط الغرفة. (Al-tawila fi wasat al-ghurfa) - The table is in the middle of the room.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to a piece of furniture for sitting.
words.example: أنا جالس على الكرسي. (Ana jalis 'ala al-kursi) - I am sitting on the chair.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to an appliance used for keeping food and drinks cold.
words.example: الطعام في الثلاجة. (Al-ta'am fi al-thalaja) - The food is in the refrigerator.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to an appliance used for washing clothes.
words.example: غسالة الملابس في المطبخ. (Ghasalat al-malabis fi al-matbakh) - The washing machine is in the kitchen.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to a basin used for washing dishes or hands.
words.example: المغسلة في المطبخ. (Al-mghasila fi al-matbakh) - The sink is in the kitchen.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to an electrical appliance used to circulate air and cool the room.
words.example: المروحة تعمل في غرفة النوم. (Al-marwaha ta'mal fi ghurfat al-nawm) - The fan is working in the bedroom.

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the action of consuming food.
words.example: أنا أكلت الفطور صباح اليوم. (I ate breakfast this morning.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the action of consuming liquids.
words.example: أحتاج إلى شرب الماء. (I need to drink water.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the action of moving from one place to another.
words.example: أذهب إلى العمل كل يوم. (I go to work every day.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the action of moving towards a place or person.
words.example: جاء صديقي إلى منزلي أمس. (My friend came to my house yesterday.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the action of doing work or being employed.
words.example: أنا أعمل في مكتبٍ كبير. (I work in a large office.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the action of resting or sleeping.
words.example: أنا بحاجة إلى النوم الآن. (I need to sleep now.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the action of reading books, articles, or other texts.
words.example: أنا أقرأ كتابًا جديدًا. (I am reading a new book.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the action of composing text with a pen, pencil, or digital device.
words.example: أكتب رسالة إلى صديقي. (I am writing a letter to my friend.)

words.when_to_say: Used to describe something that is extraordinary or leaves a strong impression.
words.example: العرض كان مبهرًا. (Al-‘ard kan mubhiran) - The performance was amazing.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe something that causes physical or emotional pain.
words.example: كانت الإصابة مؤلمة. (Kanat al-isaba mu'limah) - The injury was painful.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe something that is not clear or is shrouded in mystery.
words.example: القصة كانت غامضة. (Al-qissa kanat ghamidah) - The story was mysterious.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe something that is extremely impressive or jaw-dropping.
words.example: المنظر كان مذهلاً. (Al-manzar kan mudhilan) - The view was stunning.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe something that is unclear or not well defined.
words.example: كانت الإجابة مبهمة. (Kanat al-ijaba mubhamah) - The answer was vague.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe something that is not easy to do or understand.
words.example: الامتحان كان صعبًا. (Al-imtihan kan sa'baan) - The exam was difficult.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe something that is developed or highly sophisticated.
words.example: التكنولوجيا في هذا المجال متطورة. (Al-tekhnologia fi hadha al-majal mutatawwira) - The technology in this field is advanced.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe someone who is so surprised or shocked that they are temporarily speechless.
words.example: كان مذهولًا من الأخبار. (Kan madh-hulan min al-akhbar) - He was stunned by the news.

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to large areas of land covered with trees and vegetation.
words.example: تعتبر الغابات مكانًا مهمًا للحياة البرية. (Forests are an important habitat for wildlife.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to large landforms that rise steeply above the surrounding land.
words.example: الجبال تغطي أجزاء كبيرة من الأرض. (Mountains cover large parts of the Earth.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to large bodies of saltwater that cover much of the Earth's surface.
words.example: المحيطات تلعب دورًا كبيرًا في المناخ العالمي. (Oceans play a major role in global climate.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the presence of harmful substances in the environment.
words.example: التلوث يؤثر بشكل سلبي على صحة الإنسان. (Pollution negatively affects human health.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the long-term increase in Earth's average surface temperature due to human activities.
words.example: الاحتباس الحراري يؤدي إلى تغيرات مناخية غير مرغوب فيها. (Global warming leads to undesirable climate changes.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the variety of life on Earth, including different species, ecosystems, and genetic diversity.
words.example: التنوع البيولوجي أساسي للحفاظ على استدامة الحياة. (Biodiversity is essential for sustaining life.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to species that are at risk of becoming extinct.
words.example: العديد من الأنواع المهددة بالانقراض تحتاج إلى حماية. (Many endangered species need protection.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to energy sources that are naturally replenished, like solar and wind energy.
words.example: الطاقة المتجددة تعد بديلاً نظيفًا للطاقة التقليدية. (Renewable energy is a clean alternative to traditional energy.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to efforts made to protect the environment from harm or degradation.
words.example: يجب أن نتعاون جميعًا للحفاظ على البيئة. (We must all work together to preserve the environment.)

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the method of cooking food over an open flame or on a grill.
words.example: نحب الشواء في الهواء الطلق. (Nuhibu al-shiwaa fi al-hawa' al-talq) - We love grilling outdoors.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe food that is cooked in hot oil.
words.example: الطعام المقلي غير صحي. (Al-ta'am al-maqli ghayr sahiy) - Fried food is unhealthy.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe food that is stuffed with ingredients such as rice, meat, or vegetables.
words.example: الفلفل المحشي لذيذ. (Al-filfil al-mahshi lazidh) - The stuffed pepper is delicious.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to a combination of ingredients mixed together.
words.example: يجب أن تكون المكونات خليطًا جيدًا. (Yajibu an takuna al-mukawwinat khalitan jayyidan) - The ingredients must be a good mixture.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to a mixture of spices or liquids in which meat, fish, or vegetables are soaked to add flavor before cooking.
words.example: أضف التتبيلة إلى اللحم قبل الشواء. (Adif al-tatbila ila al-lahm qabl al-shiwaa) - Add the marinade to the meat before grilling.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the method of cooking food by immersing it in hot water.
words.example: أحب سلق الخضروات. (Uhibu salq al-khudrawat) - I love boiling vegetables.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to small dishes served before the main course.
words.example: المقبلات لذيذة جدا. (Al-muqabilat lazidha jiddan) - The appetizers are very delicious.

words.when_to say: Used when referring to the emotional state of being happy or joyful.
words.example: أشعر بالسعادة عندما أكون مع عائلتي. (I feel happiness when I am with my family.)

words.when_to say: Used when referring to the emotional state of being sad or sorrowful.
words.example: كنت في حالة من الحزن بعد سماع الأخبار. (I was in a state of sadness after hearing the news.)

words.when_to say: Used when referring to the emotional state of being angry or upset.
words.example: أشعر بالغضب عندما لا يُحترم رأيي. (I feel anger when my opinion is not respected.)

words.when_to say: Used when referring to the emotional state of being afraid or anxious.
words.example: الشعور بالخوف سيطر عليّ في الظلام. (The feeling of fear overcame me in the dark.)

words.when_to say: Used when referring to the emotional state of being surprised or astonished.
words.example: كنت في دهشة عندما رأيت المنظر الجميل. (I was in amazement when I saw the beautiful view.)

words.when_to say: Used when referring to the emotional state of being frustrated or discouraged.
words.example: شعرت بالإحباط بعد فشل المشروع. (I felt frustration after the project's failure.)

words.when_to say: Used when referring to the emotional state of deep affection or attachment.
words.example: الحب هو أجمل شعور يمكن أن يشعر به الإنسان. (Love is the most beautiful feeling a person can experience.)

words.when_to say: Used when referring to the emotional state of being nervous or worried about something.
words.example: أشعر بالقلق بشأن مستقبلي المهني. (I feel anxiety about my professional future.)

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to a place where passengers can board or disembark flights.
words.example: وصلنا إلى المطار قبل ساعتين. (Wasalna ila al-matar qabl sa'atein) - We arrived at the airport two hours ago.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to an official document allowing a person to enter, leave, or stay in a country for a specific period.
words.example: هل حصلت على التأشيرة؟ (Hal hasalta 'ala al-ta'shira?) - Did you get the visa?

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the act of booking or reserving accommodations, tickets, or services in advance.
words.example: قمت بحجز الفندق مسبقًا. (Qumtu bihajz al-funduq musabqan) - I made the hotel reservation in advance.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to traveling from one place to another, usually for leisure or business.
words.example: الرحلة إلى باريس كانت رائعة. (Al-rihla ila Paris kanat ra'iah) - The trip to Paris was wonderful.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to a person traveling with another, such as a friend, spouse, or colleague.
words.example: أنا في رحلتي مع مرافق. (Ana fi riħlati ma'a muraafiq) - I am on my trip with a companion.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the action of discovering new places, cultures, or things during travel.
words.example: استمتعت باستكشاف المدينة الجديدة. (Istimta'tu bi-istikshaf al-madina al-jadida) - I enjoyed exploring the new city.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to a place where people go for relaxation, usually offering various leisure activities and accommodations.
words.example: نحن ذاهبون إلى المنتجع على الشاطئ. (Nahnu zahibun ila al-muntaja' 'ala al-shati) - We are going to the resort by the beach.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the place where someone is traveling to.
words.example: وجهتنا هي جزر المالديف. (Wajhatuna hiya juzur al-Maldiv) - Our destination is the Maldives.

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to a system of government where power is vested in the people, typically through elected representatives.
words.example: الديمقراطية تتيح للمواطنين المشاركة في صنع القرار. (Democracy allows citizens to participate in decision-making.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the system or group of people governing a nation or state.
words.example: الحكومة مسؤولة عن تنفيذ القوانين. (The government is responsible for enforcing the laws.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the basic rights and freedoms that belong to all individuals.
words.example: يجب على كل دولة احترام حقوق الإنسان. (Every country must respect human rights.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to a state of armed conflict between different countries or groups.
words.example: الحرب لها تأثيرات مدمرة على المجتمع. (War has devastating effects on society.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to a forcible overthrow of a government or social order, in favor of a new system.
words.example: ثورة الشعب أدت إلى تغييرات جذرية في الحكومة. (The people's revolution led to radical changes in the government.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to a structured system or regime of governance.
words.example: النظام السياسي في البلاد يعتمد على الحزب الواحد. (The political system in the country relies on a single-party regime.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to cruel and oppressive rule by a single leader or regime.
words.example: الشعب عانى من الاستبداد لعقود. (The people suffered under tyranny for decades.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the concept of fairness and law, especially in the legal and political context.
words.example: يجب أن تسعى كل دولة لتحقيق العدالة لمواطنيها. (Every country must strive for justice for its citizens.)

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the action or process of putting money into something to earn a profit or gain.
words.example: الاستثمار في الأسهم قد يكون مربحًا. (Al-istithmar fi al-ashum qad yakun murbiḥan) - Investment in stocks can be profitable.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the total income generated by a company or organization.
words.example: الإيرادات من المبيعات كانت عالية هذا العام. (Al-iradat min al-mabiyat kanat 'aliya hadha al-'aam) - The revenue from sales was high this year.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe the profit or gain derived from an investment.
words.example: عائد الاستثمار كان ممتازًا. (A'id al-istithmar kan mumtazan) - The return on investment was excellent.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the rivalry between businesses or individuals striving for the same goal or market share.
words.example: المنافسة في السوق عالية هذا العام. (Al-munafasa fi al-souq 'aliya hadha al-'aam) - The competition in the market is high this year.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the financial resources available for investment or business operations.
words.example: رأس المال المستخدم في المشروع كبير. (Ra's al-mal al-mustakhdam fi al-mashru' kabeer) - The capital used in the project is large.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to a measure that shows the performance of an economy, market, or stock.
words.example: مؤشر السوق ارتفع بشكل كبير. (Mu'ashir al-souq irtafa'a bishakl kabeer) - The market index rose significantly.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the rate at which the general level of prices for goods and services rises, eroding purchasing power.
words.example: التضخم يؤثر على الاقتصاد بشكل كبير. (Al-tadhakhum yu'athir 'ala al-iqtiṣad bishakl kabeer) - Inflation is heavily affecting the economy.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe a situation where a single company or entity controls the entire supply of a product or service in the market.
words.example: الشركة تتمتع باحتكار في هذا المجال. (Al-sharika tatamatt'u bihitikar fi hadha al-majal) - The company has a monopoly in this field.

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the process of receiving or giving systematic instruction.
words.example: التعليم هو أساس تقدم الأمم. (Education is the foundation of a nation's progress.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the acquisition of knowledge or skills through study, experience, or teaching.
words.example: التعلم عملية مستمرة طوال الحياة. (Learning is a lifelong process.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the subjects comprising a course of study in a school or college.
words.example: المناهج الدراسية يجب أن تواكب التقدم التكنولوجي. (The curriculum must keep up with technological advancements.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to an educational talk to an audience, often in a formal setting.
words.example: حضرت محاضرة عن الذكاء الاصطناعي الأسبوع الماضي. (I attended a lecture on artificial intelligence last week.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to a detailed study or investigation into a particular subject to discover new facts or reach new conclusions.
words.example: البحث العلمي هو أساس الابتكار والاكتشافات. (Scientific research is the basis of innovation and discoveries.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to a collection of books and other resources for studying or research, or the building housing them.
words.example: المكتبة هي مكان هادئ للدراسة والقراءة. (The library is a quiet place for studying and reading.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to a formal assessment of knowledge or skills.
words.example: الطلاب يجب أن يستعدوا جيدًا للاختبار النهائي. (Students should prepare well for the final exam.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the profession or process of imparting knowledge or instructing students.
words.example: التدريس يحتاج إلى صبر وفهم عميق للمادة. (Teaching requires patience and a deep understanding of the subject.)

words.when_to_say: Used to describe the network of physical objects that are connected to the internet and can collect and exchange data.
words.example: إنترنت الأشياء يسمح للأجهزة بالتواصل مع بعضها البعض. (Internet al-Ashya' yasmah lil-ajhiza biltawassul ma'a ba'dihā al-ba'd) - The Internet of Things allows devices to communicate with each other.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe a set of rules or instructions followed by a computer to solve a problem or perform a task.
words.example: تعتمد محركات البحث على الخوارزميات لتقديم أفضل النتائج. (Ta'tamid muḥarrikat al-baḥth 'ala al-khawarizmiyaat li-taqdim afḍal al-natā'ij) - Search engines rely on algorithms to provide the best results.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to a person who writes, creates, and maintains software applications.
words.example: المطورون يعملون على تحديث التطبيقات. (Al-motawwirun ya'maloon 'ala tahdith al-tatbiqat) - Software developers are working on updating the applications.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the practice of working from a location outside of the traditional office, often from home.
words.example: أصبح التشغيل عن بعد شائعًا في الوقت الحاضر. (Asbaha al-tashghil 'an bu'd sha'ian fi al-waqt al-ḥāḍir) - Remote work has become common nowadays.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the practice of storing data on remote servers accessible via the internet, rather than on a local hard drive.
words.example: نحن نستخدم التخزين السحابي لتخزين الملفات. (Naḥnu nastakhdim al-takhzin al-sahabi litakhzin al-milafāt) - We use cloud storage to save the files.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe unwanted noise or disruption in a signal, especially in telecommunications or data transmission.
words.example: كانت هناك بعض التشويش أثناء المكالمة. (Kānat hunāk ba'd al-tashwish athnā' al-mukālama) - There was some interference during the call.

words.when_to_say: Used to describe the part of a software application or website that users interact with directly.
words.example: واجهة المستخدم يجب أن تكون سهلة الاستخدام. (Wajhat al-mustakhdim yajibu an takūn sāḥila al-istikhdām) - The user interface must be easy to use.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the process of inspecting, cleaning, transforming, and modeling data to discover useful information.
words.example: تحليل البيانات يساعد الشركات على اتخاذ قرارات أفضل. (Tahlil al-bayanat yusa'id al-sharikāt 'ala ittikhādh qarārāt afḍal) - Data analysis helps companies make better decisions.

words.when_to_say: Used to refer to the practice of protecting computers, networks, and data from digital attacks, damage, or unauthorized access.
words.example: أمن السيبراني مهم للغاية في عصرنا الرقمي. (Aman al-saybarani muhim lilghayah fi 'asrina al-raqmi) - Cybersecurity is extremely important in our digital age.

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to what is real or factual, as opposed to false or imaginary.
words.example: الحقيقة هي أن الكون لا يزال مليئًا بالأسرار. (The truth is that the universe is still full of mysteries.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the concept of fairness and moral rightness.
words.example: العدالة الاجتماعية هي الهدف الأسمى للمجتمع. (Social justice is the ultimate goal of society.)

words.when_to_say: Used when discussing the state of being real or having objective reality.
words.example: وجود الكائنات في الكون هو مصدر للتساؤل الفلسفي. (The existence of beings in the universe is a source of philosophical inquiry.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the power or right to act, speak, or think as one wants.
words.example: الحرية هي حق أساسي لكل فرد. (Freedom is a fundamental right for every individual.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to the quality of being based on or in accordance with reason or logic.
words.example: العقلانية تساعدنا على اتخاذ قرارات منطقية. (Rationality helps us make logical decisions.)

words.when_to_say: Used when referring to something that is not limited or conditional, but complete and universal.
words.example: الفكرة المطلق لا يمكن إدراكها بالكامل بواسطة العقل البشري. (The absolute idea cannot be fully grasped by the human mind.)
